content:
Transform the app into a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde by implementing the following comprehensive changes, following the exact dark theme UI shown in the designs:

1. Remove the existing counter feature entirely.

2. Implement a complete authentication flow with sliding transitions including:
   A. Splash Screen showing luxury car interior and chauffeur
   B. Welcome page with:
      - "Get Started" button
      - "Experience luxury travel with ease. Register and manage your bookings seamlessly."

content.overview: Transform the existing counter app into a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde by removing the counter feature, implementing a new authentication flow with sliding transitions, and updating the UI to match the dark theme design.
new_features: Splash Screen with luxury car interior and chauffeur
Welcome Page with 'Get Started' button and introductory text
modified_features: Update app structure to accommodate new authentication flow
Revise UI components to match the dark theme design
removed_features: Counter feature including all related UI and ViewModel logic
content.architectural_changes: Adopt a new UI flow for authentication, requiring updates to the routing and state management to handle new screens and transitions.
cross_cutting_concerns: Update tests to cover new authentication flow and UI changes
Revise documentation to reflect new app purpose and features
Ensure performance optimization for new transitions and UI components
Implement security best practices for authentication
